name: Haus Steinfeld
description: Our house "Steinfeld" can be found 2km from the centre of Mayrhofen, in a quiet and sunny position in Eckertau. We have four holiday apartments, suitable for between 2-6 persons (approx. 60 to 110m²). There is a car park, and a beautiful sun bathing area with sun loungers for use free of charge. The ski and village bus stop is conveniently situated just outside the front door, which makes it easy to travel from one part of the village to another. A grocery store and a restaurant can be found close by.

Price excludes: A final cleaning charge
Includes: Underground parking, sun loungers.

At the roundabout at the beginning of Mayrhofen turn left. At the next junction (IQ petrol station) turn left again and drive straight on through the villages of Laubichl and Hollenzen. At Eckertau turn right immediately after the Getränkehandels Unterberger.
Alternative route: After Hippach turn left from the B169 at Bühel (opposite the Alko-Kober factory) and turn left just before the Getränkehandel Unterberger.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet
makesOffer.description: Apartment suitable for 2-3 persons (approx. 65m²). Kitchen, lounge with one bed, double and single room, shower, WC. The apartments are rustically furnished, and are equipped with a telephone, SAT-TV, radio, microwave, slicing machine...

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet
makesOffer.description: Kitchen, lounge with bed, bedroom with 3 beds, reading room with bed, bath, WC. The apartments are rustically furnished, and are equipped with a telephone, SAT-TV, radio, microwave, slicing machine...

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Kitchen with dish washer, lounge with a traditional tiled stove, bed, 1 double bedroom, 2 bedrooms with 2 single beds, bathroom, WC, store room. The apartments are rustically furnished, and are equipped with a telephone, SAT-TV, radio, microwave, slicing machine...
